contest-event.event-date:
Nov. 28, 2004 D Tameside Youth Contest
Tameside Youth Contest 0 Entertainments Contest
tameside-youth-contest
None
Tameside Hippodrome, Ashton-under-Lyne Best Cornet: Smithills School Senior Rachel Fenton. Best Horn: Youth Brass 2000 - Tracy Coulston. Best Euphonium: Youth Brass 2000 Alex Seedhouse. Best Trombone: Poynton Youth Debbie Yu. Best Basses: Stockport School Senior Andrew Myers, Eric Legood, Phillip Cargill and Graham Keen. Best Percussion: Smithills School Senior Danny Govan, David Smith, Alex Hardman, Lisa McGrillis and Chole Pennington.
Sept. 24, 2010, 1:47 p.m. May 15, 2011, 4:42 p.m.
1 Smithills Schools Senior Band Kevin Gibbs
2 Poynton Youth Andy Hirst
3 Youth Brass 2000 Chris Jeans
4 Stockport Schools' Senior Brass Band Colin Duxbury
5 South East Cheshire Youth Louise Renshaw
6 Dobcross Youth Band Nick Payne
